verses.verse: וַיְדַבֵּ֨ר <S%H1696><s%> vay-dab-Ber spake יְהוָ֧ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh And the LORD אֶל־ <S%H413><s%> 'el- to מֹשֶׁ֛ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh unto Moses בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar in the wilderness סִינַ֖י <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai of Sinai בְּאֹ֣הֶל <S%H168><s%> be-'O-hel in the tabernacle מוֹעֵ֑ד <S%H4150><s%> mo-'Ed; of the congregation בְּאֶחָד֩ <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֨דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֜י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni [day] of the second בַּשָּׁנָ֣ה <S%H8141><s%> bash-sha-Nah year הַשֵּׁנִ֗ית <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Nit, in the second לְצֵאתָ֛ם <S%H3318><s%> le-tze-Tam after they were come out מֵאֶ֥רֶץ <S%H776><s%> me-'E-retz of the land מִצְרַ֖יִם <S%H4714><s%> mitz-Ra-yim of Egypt לֵאמֹֽר׃ <S%H559><s%> le-Mor. saying

שְׂא֗וּ <S%H5375><s%> se-'U, Take אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- רֹאשׁ֙ <S%H7218><s%> roSh ye the sum כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- of all עֲדַ֣ת <S%H5712><s%> 'a-Dat of all the congregation בְּנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> be-nei- of the children יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, of Israel לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par with the number שֵׁמ֔וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot, of [their] names כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָ֖ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char every male לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam. by their polls

מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim From twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze all that are able to go forth צָבָ֖א <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va to war בְּיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <S%H3478><s%> be-Yis-ra-'El; in Israel תִּפְקְד֥וּ <S%H6485><s%> tif-ke-Du shall number אֹתָ֛ם <S%H853><s%> 'o-Tam לְצִבְאֹתָ֖ם <S%H6635><s%> le-tziv-'o-Tam them by their armies אַתָּ֥ה <S%H859><s%> 'at-Tah you וְאַהֲרֹֽן׃ <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron. thou and Aaron

וְאִתְּכֶ֣ם <S%H854><s%> ve-'it-te-Chem for יִהְי֔וּ <S%H1961><s%> yih-Yu, shall be a אִ֥ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish And with you there shall be a man אִ֖ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish of every לַמַּטֶּ֑ה <S%H4294><s%> lam-mat-Teh; tribe אִ֛ישׁ <S%H376><s%> 'ish every one רֹ֥אשׁ <S%H7218><s%> rosh head לְבֵית־ <S%H1004><s%> le-veit- of the house אֲבֹתָ֖יו <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tav of his fathers הֽוּא׃ <S%H1931><s%> Hu. he

וְאֵ֙לֶּה֙ <S%H428><s%> ve-'El-leh These שְׁמ֣וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot And these [are] the names הָֽאֲנָשִׁ֔ים <S%H376><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim, of the men אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who יַֽעַמְד֖וּ <S%H5975><s%> ya-'am-Du that shall stand אִתְּכֶ֑ם <S%H854><s%> 'it-te-Chem; for לִרְאוּבֵ֕ן <S%H7205><s%> lir-'u-Ven with you of [the tribe of] Reuben אֱלִיצ֖וּר <S%H468><s%> 'e-li-Tzur Elizur בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son שְׁדֵיאֽוּר׃ <S%H7707><s%> she-dei-'Ur. of Shedeur
לְשִׁמְע֕וֹן <S%H8095><s%> le-shim-'on Of Simeon שְׁלֻמִיאֵ֖ל <S%H8017><s%> she-lu-mi-'El Shelumiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צוּרִֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H6701><s%> tzu-Ri-shad-Dai. of Zurishaddai
לִֽיהוּדָ֕ה <S%H3063><s%> li-hu-Dah Of Judah נַחְשׁ֖וֹן <S%H5177><s%> nach-Shon Nahshon בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּינָדָֽב׃ <S%H5992><s%> 'am-mi-na-Dav. of Amminadab
לְיִ֨שָּׂשכָ֔ר <S%H3485><s%> le-Yis-so-sh-Char, Of Issachar נְתַנְאֵ֖ל <S%H5417><s%> ne-tan-'El Nethaneel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son צוּעָֽר׃ <S%H6686><s%> tzu-'Ar. of Zuar
לִזְבוּלֻ֕ן <S%H2074><s%> liz-vu-Lun Of Zebulun אֱלִיאָ֖ב <S%H446><s%> 'e-li-'Av Eliab בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son חֵלֹֽן׃ <S%H2497><s%> che-Lon. of Helon

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei Of the children יוֹסֵ֔ף <S%H3130><s%> yo-Sef, of Joseph לְאֶפְרַ֕יִם <S%H669><s%> le-'ef-Ra-yim of Ephraim אֱלִישָׁמָ֖ע <S%H476><s%> 'e-li-sha-Ma' Elishama בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּיה֑וּד <S%H5989><s%> 'am-mi-Hud; of Ammihud לִמְנַשֶּׁ֕ה <S%H4519><s%> lim-nash-Sheh of Manasseh גַּמְלִיאֵ֖ל <S%H1583><s%> gam-li-'El Gamaliel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son פְּדָהצֽוּר׃ <S%H6301><s%> pe-da-h-Tzur. of Pedahzur
לְבִ֨נְיָמִ֔ן <S%H1144><s%> le-Vin-ya-Min, Of Benjamin אֲבִידָ֖ן <S%H27><s%> 'a-vi-Dan Abidan בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son גִּדְעֹנִֽי׃ <S%H1441><s%> gid-'o-Ni. of Gideoni
לְדָ֕ן <S%H1835><s%> le-Dan Of Dan אֲחִיעֶ֖זֶר <S%H295><s%> 'a-chi-'E-zer Ahiezer בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עַמִּֽישַׁדָּֽי׃ <S%H5996><s%> 'am-Mi-shad-Dai. of Ammishaddai
לְאָשֵׁ֕ר <S%H836><s%> le-'a-Sher Of Asher פַּגְעִיאֵ֖ל <S%H6295><s%> pag-'i-'El Pagiel בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עָכְרָֽן׃ <S%H5918><s%> 'a-che-Ran. of Ocran
לְגָ֕ד <S%H1410><s%> le-Gad Of Gad אֶלְיָסָ֖ף <S%H460><s%> 'el-ya-Saf Eliasaph בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son דְּעוּאֵֽל׃ <S%H1845><s%> de-'u-'El. of Deuel
לְנַ֨פְתָּלִ֔י <S%H5321><s%> le-Naf-ta-Li, Of Naphtali אֲחִירַ֖ע <S%H299><s%> 'a-chi-Ra' Ahira בֶּן־ <S%H1121><s%> ben- the son עֵינָֽן׃ <S%H5881><s%> 'ei-Nan. of Enan

אֵ֚לֶּה <S%H428><s%> 'El-leh These; קְרִיאֵי ke-ri-'ei כקְרוּאֵ֣י <S%H7148><s%> ke-ru-'Ei famous קהָעֵדָ֔ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah, of the congregation נְשִׂיאֵ֖י <S%H5387><s%> ne-si-'Ei princes מַטּ֣וֹת <S%H4294><s%> mat-Tot of the tribes אֲבוֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> a-vo-Tam; of their fathers רָאשֵׁ֛י <S%H7218><s%> ra-Shei heads אַלְפֵ֥י <S%H505><s%> 'al-Fei of thousands יִשְׂרָאֵ֖ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El Israel הֵֽם׃ <S%H1992><s%> Hem. in

וַיִּקַּ֥ח <S%H3947><s%> vai-yik-Kach took מֹשֶׁ֖ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh And Moses וְאַהֲרֹ֑ן <S%H175><s%> ve-'a-ha-Ron; and Aaron אֵ֚ת <S%H853><s%> 'et הָאֲנָשִׁ֣ים <S%H582><s%> ha-'a-na-Shim these men הָאֵ֔לֶּה <S%H428><s%> ha-'El-leh, these אֲשֶׁ֥ר <S%H834><s%> 'a-Sher who נִקְּב֖וּ <S%H5344><s%> nik-ke-Vu which are expressed בְּשֵׁמֽוֹת׃ <S%H8034><s%> be-she-Mot. by [their] names

וְאֵ֨ת <S%H853><s%> ve-'Et כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- all הָעֵדָ֜ה <S%H5712><s%> ha-'e-Dah all the congregation הִקְהִ֗ילוּ <S%H6950><s%> hik-Hi-lu, together בְּאֶחָד֙ <S%H259><s%> be-'e-Chad on the first לַחֹ֣דֶשׁ <S%H2320><s%> la-Cho-desh month הַשֵּׁנִ֔י <S%H8145><s%> hash-she-Ni, [day] of the second וַיִּתְיַֽלְד֥וּ <S%H3205><s%> vai-yit-yal-Du and they declared their pedigrees עַל־ <S%H5921><s%> 'al- in מִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot, of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֥ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָ֛ה <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֖עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah and upward לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָֽם׃ <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam. by their polls

כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <S%H834><s%> ka-'a-Sher after צִוָּ֥ה <S%H6680><s%> tziv-Vah commanded יְהוָ֖ה <S%H3068><s%> Yah-weh As the LORD אֶת־ <S%H853><s%> 'et- מֹשֶׁ֑ה <S%H4872><s%> mo-Sheh; Moses וַֽיִּפְקְדֵ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> vai-yif-ke-Dem so he numbered בְּמִדְבַּ֥ר <S%H4057><s%> be-mid-Bar them in the wilderness סִינָֽי׃ <S%H5514><s%> si-Nai. of Sinai פ Peh

וַיִּהְי֤וּ <S%H1961><s%> vai-yih-Yu become בְנֵֽי־ <S%H1121><s%> ve-nei- And the children רְאוּבֵן֙ <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven of Reuben בְּכֹ֣ר <S%H1060><s%> be-Chor eldest son יִשְׂרָאֵ֔ל <S%H3478><s%> Yis-ra-'El, Israel's תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-mOt of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam, by their polls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, every male מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va. to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> pe-ku-dei-Hem Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh of them [even] of the tribe רְאוּבֵ֑ן <S%H7205><s%> re-'u-Ven; of Reuben שִׁשָּׁ֧ה <S%H8337><s%> shish-Shah and six וְאַרְבָּעִ֛ים <S%H705><s%> ve-'ar-ba-'Im [were] forty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וַחֲמֵ֥שׁ <S%H2568><s%> va-cha-Mesh and five מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred פ Peh

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei Of the children שִׁמְע֔וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on, of Simeon תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers פְּקֻדָ֗יו <S%H6485><s%> pe-ku-Dav, those that were numbered בְּמִסְפַּ֤ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par of them according to the number שֵׁמוֹת֙ <S%H8034><s%> she-mOt of the names לְגֻלְגְּלֹתָ֔ם <S%H1538><s%> le-gul-ge-lo-Tam, by their polls כָּל־ <S%H3605><s%> kol- every זָכָ֗ר <S%H2145><s%> za-Char, every male מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va. to war

פְּקֻדֵיהֶ֖ם <S%H6485><s%> pe-ku-dei-Hem Those that were numbered לְמַטֵּ֣ה <S%H4294><s%> le-mat-Teh of them [even] of the tribe שִׁמְע֑וֹן <S%H8095><s%> shim-'on; of Simeon תִּשְׁעָ֧ה <S%H8672><s%> tish-'Ah and nine וַחֲמִשִּׁ֛ים <S%H2572><s%> va-cha-mish-Shim [were] fifty אֶ֖לֶף <S%H505><s%> 'E-lef thousand וּשְׁלֹ֥שׁ <S%H7969><s%> u-she-Losh and three מֵאֽוֹת׃ <S%H3967><s%> me-'ot. hundred פ Peh

לִבְנֵ֣י <S%H1121><s%> liv-Nei Of the children גָ֔ד <S%H1410><s%> Gad, of Gad תּוֹלְדֹתָ֥ם <S%H8435><s%> tol-do-Tam by their generations לְמִשְׁפְּחֹתָ֖ם <S%H4940><s%> le-mish-pe-cho-Tam after their families לְבֵ֣ית <S%H1004><s%> le-Veit by the house אֲבֹתָ֑ם <S%H1><s%> 'a-vo-Tam; of their fathers בְּמִסְפַּ֣ר <S%H4557><s%> be-mis-Par according to the number שֵׁמ֗וֹת <S%H8034><s%> she-Mot, of the names מִבֶּ֨ן <S%H1121><s%> mib-Ben old עֶשְׂרִ֤ים <S%H6242><s%> 'es-Rim from twenty שָׁנָה֙ <S%H8141><s%> sha-Nah years וָמַ֔עְלָה <S%H4605><s%> va-Ma'-lah, and upward כֹּ֖ל <S%H3605><s%> kol whoever יֹצֵ֥א <S%H3318><s%> yo-Tze all that were able to go forth צָבָֽא׃ <S%H6635><s%> tza-Va. to war
